body.name: Evenflo LiteMax Infant Car Seat, 18.3x17.8x30 Inch (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 11 hrs 45 mins
features: Extended Use: Accommodates Growing Infants Longer: 4-35 lb weight rating and 4 shoulder harness positions
Lightweight: Extremely lightweight and easy to carry
Ergonomic Handle: More comfortable to carry in the bend of the arm
Full Coverage Canopy: Provides full protection from sun, wind and rain
body.description: Evenflo continues to build on our 100-year tradition of designing superior child-safety systems built to last with our LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat. The LiteMax 35 baby seat is an easy-to-install and carry, remarkably lightweight infant carrier with seat that is durable and designed with multiple handy features. This rear-facing infant car seat fits newborns and babies from 4 to 35 pounds that measure 17 to 32 inches tall. It includes a stay-in-car convenience base that makes things easy for parents or other grownups when transporting newborn babies or infants. This child’s car seat is made from high-quality materials and assembled with precision-manufacturing standards. It has also been tested at twice the federal crash test standard.We develop each of our child-safety products with the valuable input of parents looking for practical solutions to keep their babies safe. The Evenflo LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat was engineered with an easy-to-install base that is equipped with a one-step vehicle belt lock-off for a secure and quick installation. This feature allows the car seat to remain safely secured yet makes it easy to remove, too. The base also offers 4 reclining options to optimize comfort. This newborn car seat features buckle pockets that neatly tuck buckle tongues away for improved loading and unloading, a full-coverage canopy to protect children from the elements, machine-washable pads for easier cleanup, and removable head and body pillows to keep baby more comfortable.For almost a century, Evenflo has been a leader in safety, innovation, and education. Evenflo has been a trusted source of precision-manufactured, high-quality children products that are engineered for real-life situations. Additionally, all Evenflo car seats and strollers include ParentLink customer-service perks like real-time chat and free live video installation support.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.

productInformation.name: Additional product features
productInformation.value: ‎Online Chat: Chat with our ParentLink customer service experts online in real time, Live Video Installation Support: Schedule an appointment to have a certified car seat safety technician guide you through a proper vehicle installation

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE EASIEST CAR SEAT TO CARRY Lighter than leading competitors with an exclusive ergonomic handle designed for your maximum comfort as you carry your little one.
INTEGRATED BELT LOCK-OFF SYSTEM Provides peace of mind that the base is securely and correctly installed.

STAY-IN-CAR BASE WITH RECLINE INDICATOR Separate, stay-in-car base for easy car seat transition in and out of vehicle. Easy-to-read pendulum level indicator shows when the seat is properly leveled in vehicle for precise installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for my granddaughter and it is so lightweight and easy to use. It was perfect for her newborn use and as she gets a little older.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe, Affordable, and Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: This car seat was on every recommended infant car seat list. It is used as a back up, but it is such a nice seat. The only negative review I saw when researching was that it is difficult to install, and I could not disagree more!! It was SO easy to install (especially if you read the instructions- duh!). I have had to put this in and take it out multiple times, and it took only a few seconds.The straps are easy to move based on the size of your infant.Lightweight and cushiony.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best car seat and affordable 3rd baby
reviews.reviewText: I will update when baby gets here in March but this is my third baby and the car seat seems to be very comfortable and padded well.Best car seat I’ve bought for very affordable read the instructions and you should have no problem with any baby fitting or squeezing legs because even the leg straps are adjustable and goes by weight I’ve never been able to put a car seat base in a car and it be secure or sturdy but in our Tahoe the base does not budge I feel very comfortable with baby going in this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely light and safe
reviews.reviewText: We had a firefighter tell us this seat is better than a doona safety wise

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great, easy car seat. Very versatile, works great as baby carrier and with the stroller you can get as well. We use it everyday and rely heavily on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly lightweight but doesn’t feel cheap!
reviews.reviewText: Received early and it was sitting outside. It was incredibly light to move the box inside! Once opened I was still shocked at how light it was with the base attached. The base is very nice and sturdy loooking. It has the indicator to help get the perfect angle and a few pieces that adjust to let that happen. Instructions were simple. The car seat is incredibly lightweight without feeling cheap or like it would fall apart and the fabric feels nice. It seems like it would wipe off quite easy but I’m not sure yet. The handle was good quality, folds easy and is thick enough it doesn’t hurt your arm. The canapoy seems nice. Thin but it would do the job. The only concern I have is with the size it’s very narrow. Not sure how long a baby could fit in there. It’s very long just kind of skinny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect car seat for my little girl

reviews.reviewerName: Excelente compra, los colores están bellos
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Me gustaron mucho los colores, todo es tal cual en las fotos, recomendado.

reviews.reviewTitle: Before Buying, YOU Should Read This! :: My Honest and real review
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Evenflo LiteMax LS Car Seat in the Riverstone color, and I'm excited to share my positive review of this versatile and secure car seat. Join me as I highlight the key features that make this car seat a reliable choice for parents on the go.Pros:Lightweight Design: The Evenflo LiteMax LS is exceptionally lightweight, making it easy to carry and install in various vehicles without causing strain or discomfort.Enhanced Safety: The car seat is equipped with advanced safety features, including a sturdy and secure 5-point harness system, providing peace of mind during every journey.Adjustable Headrest: The adjustable headrest ensures a comfortable and snug fit for growing children, offering optimal support and protection.Cons:Limited Color Options: While the Riverstone color offers a sleek and modern appearance, some parents may desire more color choices to match their personal style or vehicle interior.Limited Extended Use: The LiteMax LS is designed for infants and younger children, which means it may need to be replaced as the child grows beyond the weight and height limits.Conclusion:The Evenflo LiteMax LS Car Seat in Riverstone is a fantastic choice for parents seeking a lightweight and secure car seat for their little ones. Its lightweight design and advanced safety features make it a convenient and dependable option for families on the move. The adjustable headrest ensures a comfortable and personalized fit for children as they grow.While the Riverstone color offers a sleek look, a broader range of color options could cater to diverse preferences. Additionally, parents may need to consider the car seat's weight and height limits to ensure it meets their child's needs throughout different stages of growth.In summary, the Evenflo LiteMax LS Car Seat offers the perfect combination of portability and safety. I hope my review has provided valuable insights, and if you have any questions, feel free to ask. Safe travels with your little one!

Al principio dudaba de donde comprar un asiento para mi hija de un mes, mi esposa y yo necesitabamos un asiento de coche donde nuestra pequeña estuviera cómoda y no decepcionó, el asiento cumple las medidas de seguridad, los materiales son resistentes, para los que lo vayan a comprar solo un punto malo, no hay un manual en español que diga como hay que desarmarlo de la base, solo trae una leves instrucciones pero el manual esta completamente en ingles pero bien explicado.
Bought this for a friend - they said it was light and easy to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Está increíble y a un súper precio.
reviews.reviewText: Nos encantó. Compramos 2 porque esperamos mellizos y su calidad es muy buena. Aunque aún no los hemos instalado en el carro, si se ve que ocuparán mucho espacio, sin embargo, se ve muy seguro y efectivamente viene con la base para el carro, el cual puede desmontarse fácilmente para sacar sólo el portabebe. Además y lo increíble es que llegaron súper rápido... mi entrega estaba programada para el jueves 30 de mayo y llegó el día 26, dos días después de realizar la compra. Recomendado. Ya que nazcan mis bebés actualizo mi recomendación y les cuento cómo nos fue.
Compact which is perfect if you need to put three seats in a row in your back seat. Easy to assemble and use. Great value for the money
